read from folder or zip with the content of the MQ txt folder.

Source: R/tidyMS_MQProteinGroups.R
tidyMQ_Peptides_Config.Rd

read from folder or zip with the content of the MQ txt folder.

tidyMQ_Peptides_Config(
  MQtxtfolder,
  use = c("peptides", "modificationSpecificPeptides"),
  id_extractor = function(df) {     fgcz.gsea.ora::get_UniprotID_from_fasta_header(df,
    idcolumn = "top_protein") },
  remove_rev = TRUE
)

Arguments

MQtxtfolder

path to folder
use

either peptides.txt or modificationSpecificPeptides.txt
id_extractor

function to parse id's
remove_rev

should reverse sequences be removed

See also

Other MaxQuant: INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, plot_MQ_intensity_vs_retention_time(), tidyMQ_Evidence(), tidyMQ_PeptideProtein(), tidyMQ_Peptides(), tidyMQ_ProteinGroups(), tidyMQ_allPeptides(), tidyMQ_from_Sites(), tidyMQ_from_modSpecific_to_peptide(), tidyMQ_merged(), tidyMQ_modificationSpecificPeptides(), tidyMQ_top_protein_name()
